title: May Loves Hugs
backCoverBlurb: A story about hugs and cuddles. May loves hugging his teddy bear and mommy. Join him in this heartwarming tale of affection.
characterDescription: A young toddler boy with dark blonde, curly hair and big blue eyes. He often has an expression of surprise or wonder. He is wearing a blue and white striped shirt and a light blue bib.

pages.text: It was a sunny morning. May was ready for a hug!
pages.imagePrompt: May with curly blonde hair and blue eyes looks excited in his high chair.

pages.text: He saw his favorite teddy bear. Hug! said May.
pages.imagePrompt: May holding a fluffy brown teddy bear tightly.

pages.text: Soft and warm, the teddy felt so good.
pages.imagePrompt: Close up of May smiling while hugging his teddy bear.

pages.text: Then Mommy walked into the room. Hug! May cried.
pages.imagePrompt: May reaching out his arms towards his mommy.

pages.text: Mommy gave him a big, sweet squeeze.
pages.imagePrompt: May being hugged by his mommy, looking very happy.

pages.text: Hugs are the best! thought little May.
pages.imagePrompt: May with a wide smile and bright blue eyes.

pages.text: He gave his kitty a gentle hug too. Purr, purr.
pages.imagePrompt: May gently patting a soft kitten.

pages.text: Even his pillow got a sleepy hug at nap time.
pages.imagePrompt: May lying down with his head on a soft white pillow.

pages.text: Hugs make everyone feel happy and safe.
May loved to share his hugs all day long.
pages.imagePrompt: May waving his hands with a joyful expression.

pages.text: One more big hug for Mommy before bed.
pages.imagePrompt: May hugging his mommy again in the evening light.

pages.text: Sweet dreams, May. Hugs for you tonight.
pages.imagePrompt: May sleeping soundly with his teddy bear.
